input_text:
Job Title: Assistant Executive Director (RN Preferred)

Location: Birmingham, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
JOB DETAILS

Assistant Executive Director (RN Preferred)

Working with us means being part of something special: A team that is passionate about making an impact on our patients’ lives each and every day. Unlike the typical hospital setting, our facility offers you the unique opportunity to walk alongside patients on their road to recovery from many different conditions. As you care for and help patients achieve goals and regain independence, you can form significant relationships with them and celebrate the successes they experience along the way.

General Overview: Assistant Executive Director assists with the oversight and management of every department within the long term care facility. Areas such as nursing and medical services are planned, evaluated and carried out properly, social services and activity programs to make sure they meet the physical, emotional and psychological need of residents. We are seeking a dynamic candidate that is seeking to expand their career in the field of skilled care as an Administrator while focusing on customer service.

Qualifications

Active Administrators license preferred OR 2 years experience as an AssistantCurrent RN or LPN License - preferred but not required*Must possess ability to efficiently problem-solve, plan, organize, develop, implement, and interpret programs, goals, objectives, policies, and procedures necessary for providing quality care and maintaining a sound operation.Must be able to maintain good staff relations and employee moralePatience, tact, enthusiasm and positive attitude toward the elderly

We offer a competitive benefits and salary package as well as a supportive leadership framework for a rewarding and successful work environment.

Become a part of a dynamic organization that truly believes in the compassionate delivery and value of the services we provide to the residents we serve, to the care and development of our staff, and to the communities we serve.

EOE

“Our Family Caring for Yours"

Job Ref #: 9dff9280-ad8f-4dd6-b5ba-7790bbdb946a

Date Posted: 2024-04-18

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Assistant Executive Director (RN Preferred)
output_json.summary: Passionate about making an impact on patients’ lives, this role involves overseeing and managing departments within a long-term care facility.

Ensures proper planning, evaluation, and carrying out of nursing and medical services
Ensures social services and activity programs meet the physical, emotional, and psychological needs of residents
Expands career in the field of skilled care as an Administrator while focusing on customer service
output_json.company_information: A dynamic organization that believes in the compassionate delivery and value of services provided to residents, staff, and communities
